content.content: anyways what imma do now today is study algos and implement them this is the winter imma consume more info than anyone ever and imma absorb it also :D

chasing an aesthetic that is particularly mine ;D

toh i was thinking what should the current aesthetic i should be chasing be

training arc i wanna train my body to move like achilles and i want to be more chill and want things in control, its time again to see that outer things dont really matter its the inside things
